Articles.Content:
The following showcase is for unmanned science-gathering space probes only. Landers count, rovers do not. Bonus kudos if you use SCANSat.

- - - Updated - - -

![yvcBWQr.png](http://i.imgur.com/yvcBWQr.png)

This is the only probe design I have that doesn't look like complete butts. It's a basic early-career (relatively) probe with magnetometer and multi-spectral imaging capability.

> 
> Aww.. no rover love?

I believe rovers already have a showcase thread somewhere.

> 
> I believe rovers already have a showcase thread somewhere.

[Indeed they do.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24599-Post-your-Rover-MEGATHREAD)

I make lots of science probes. 

![E9qqIih.png](http://i.imgur.com/E9qqIih.png)

![PLzTghw.png](http://i.imgur.com/PLzTghw.png)
Oooh, I love the way you alternated between the 3x2s and 1x6s!
